TopicTitle: doing research on the mun,or any other moon or planet

Articles.Content:
so imagine this like what i'm going to tell you,first you send little houses to the moon,then send the kerbals to there,after that,kerbals eat,drink,sleep and do research!! there,just like the marsone mission,but of course food and water is limited,and you have to send more to them after 2 years or 3

check out this suggestion,talking about giving kerbals an insanity bar,

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52302-eating-drinking-sleeping-and-an-insanity-bar-for-the-kerbals-%21%21?p=689995#post689995

Edited October 11, 2013 by theghost2333
They said they could do research already in .22, do you keep up with the devs at all?
Yup, research and development is one of the major features in 0.22 (which is apparently only a few weeks away!). Thread closed.
